Title: Relates to allowing for the examination of industrial development agencies and not-for-profit corporations by county comptrollers
Summary: Allows for the examination of industrial development agencies and not-for-profit corporations by county comptrollers.
LawCode: Add ยง2803-a, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to allowing for the examination of industrial development agencies and not-for-profit corporations by county comptrollers
